EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #14.2019 Dealer Update #14
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - May 31, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales & NEXT Bulletins | May 2019
FANS1/A+ & PM-CPDLC Upgrade
- This bulletin announces the availability of an Upgrade Program to provide FANS 1/A+ operations and PM-CPDLC capability for operators with F900A/B/C/EX, CL601 and Legacy 600/650 aircraft, already equipped with Mark III CMU - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-34 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-34 PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft %28Mk III to Mk II Plus%29.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​
- For Hawker 800 A/B/XP and Hawker 1000 A/B owners, Honeywell is pleased to offer discounted pricing for ADS-B Out compliance and FMS 6.1 software upgrade. This limited time package offering will be managed using equipment exchanges and on-wing software update, minimizing aircraft downtime. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-35 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-35 Hawker 800 %26 1000 Special Offering FMS 6-1 %26 ADSB.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
TRA-100B Mode S Transponder Upgrade​​
- The TRA100-B transponder has been designed for the next generation air traffic environment and will deliver reductions in flight delays and fuel consumption. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_20 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_20%20TRA-100B Transponder.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
